headline: HONEYWELL COCKPIT TECHNOLOGIES SELECTED BY AVIANCA FOR USE IN NEW AIRBUS A320NEO FLEET
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) announced today that Avianca, Colombia's largest airline, has selected its portfolio of avionics technologies and mechanical systems for use in its new Airbus A320neo fleet. The adoption of Honeywell's latest cockpit technologies will help Avianca improve operational efficiencies and maximize situational awareness for its pilots. It also supports Honeywell's portfolio alignment to three powerful megatrends, including the future of aviation.
